item.title: Using VirtualCAN inside docker on macOS
item.description: At SmartAg, we use Docker to manage the development and runtime environments for our embedded software. For performing full-system integrated tests, we have built comprehensive simulators that mimic the behavior of the hardware that we automate. Since most of the hardware communication happens over CAN, VirtualCAN is a great way of faking the hardware signals. Until now, any code that required a CAN interface could not run on my Macbook Pro.
